context: Tests whether the agent properly uses audit scripts, implements baseline comparison, organizes results correctly, and follows proper audit workflow procedures.

checklist.name: Audit script execution
checklist.description: Uses sh scripts/audit-skills.sh command or similar audit script execution

checklist.name: JSON output format
checklist.description: Generates structured JSON results using --json flag or equivalent

checklist.name: Baseline comparison
checklist.description: Compares current audit results against previous audit data showing score changes

checklist.name: Directory structure organization
checklist.description: Organizes results in .context/audits/ structure or mentions dated audit storage

checklist.name: NEVER skip baseline rule
checklist.description: Demonstrates understanding that baseline comparison is critical for recurring audits

checklist.name: Score threshold application
checklist.description: Applies >= 84 (passing) or >= 108 (A-grade) thresholds to evaluate skills

checklist.name: Grade assignment
checklist.description: Converts numerical scores to letter grades (A/B/C/D/F system)

checklist.name: Trend analysis
checklist.description: Analyzes score improvements or declines between audits

checklist.name: PR workflow consideration
checklist.description: Mentions --pr-changes-only flag or selective audit for changed skills

checklist.name: Skill artifact validation
checklist.description: Uses validate-skill-artifacts.sh script to check directory conventions and artifact compliance

checklist.name: Consistency checks
checklist.description: Uses check-consistency.sh script to verify structural consistency across skills

checklist.name: Reproducible audit process
checklist.description: Documents commands and methodology for consistent future audits
